participant_1.name: Emily Turner
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about art, with a love for nature and family.
participant_1.background: I took my children to the mountains to see the fall colors. I make 35 million a year. Jasper may be jealous of my new Chevy. I want to be reincarnated as a person who can live a life of leisure and focus on my passion for drawing. I once drove a car! My friend told me what to do while I drove.

participant_2.name: David Smith
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and reflective, enjoys solitude and the simple pleasures of life.
participant_2.background: I'm going to enjoy my weekend without any kids around. I do not have many friends. I'm always happy when the summer ends. I'm not very close to my family, but I'm working on it. I enjoy a cold glass of sweet tea to cool down on a hot summer day.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you! Just got home from work.
Nice! What is your job?
I work as a graphic designer.
Oh wow, that must be fun!
It is very fun, I love it!
That's great! I love art.
Me too! I love to paint and draw.
That's awesome! Do you have any of your art online?
I do! I have a website where I sell my art.
Oh wow, I'll have to check that out!
Sure! It's www.myartwebsite.com
Thanks! I'll check it out later.
You're welcome!
So, what did you do this weekend?
Well, I took my kids to the mountains to see the fall colors.
Oh wow, that sounds like a lot of fun!
It was! We had a great time.
That's awesome! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks
